description: A dashboard that gives an overview of Tailscale Machine daemon metrics.

panels.description: A stat panel showing the number of Tailscale machines reporting to the selected Tailscale control plane.
panels.title: Tailscale Machines

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the number of advertised and approved routes for the selected Tailscale machines.
panels.title: Advertised / Approved Routes

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the distribution of outbound paths for the selected Tailscale machines.
panels.title: Paths Distribution Inbound [1h]

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the distribution of inbound paths for the selected Tailscale machines.
panels.title: Paths Distribution Outbound [1h]

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the distribution of outbound paths for the selected Tailscale machines.
panels.title: Inbound vs Outbound Traffic [1h]

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the distribution of dropped packets by reason for the selected Tailscale machines.
panels.title: Dropped Packets by Reason [1h]

panels.description: A table panel showing the top 20 Tailscale machines by inbound traffic over the last hour.
panels.title: Top 20 Machines by Inbound Traffic (1h)

panels.description: A table panel showing the Tailscale machines with unadvertised routes.
panels.title: Machines with Unapproved Routes

panels.description: A table panel showing the Tailscale machines with dropped packets in the last hour.
panels.title: Machines with Dropped Packets (1h)

panels.description: A bar gauge panel showing the number of health messages by type.
panels.title: Health Messages by Type

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the outbound dropped packets by reason.
panels.title: Outbound Dropped Packets by Reason

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the inbound bytes by path.
panels.title: Inbound Bytes by Path

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the inbound packets by path.
panels.title: Inbound Packets by Path

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the outbound bytes by path.
panels.title: Outbound Bytes by Path

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the outbound packets by path.
panels.title: Outbound Packets by Path

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the number of advertised and approved routes for the selected Tailscale machines.
panels.title: Advertised / Approved Routes

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the DERP vs Non-DERP outbound traffic for the selected Tailscale machine.
panels.title: DERP vs Non-DERP Outbound Traffic [1h]

panels.description: A pie chart panel showing the distribution of dropped packets by reason for the selected Tailscale machines.
panels.title: Dropped Packets by Reason [1h]

panels.description: A bar gauge panel showing the number of health messages by type for the selected Tailscale machine.
panels.title: Health Messages by Type

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the outbound dropped packets by reason for the selected Tailscale machine.
panels.title: Outbound Dropped Packets by Reason

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the inbound bytes by path for the selected Tailscale machine.
panels.title: Inbound Bytes by Path

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the inbound packets by path for the selected Tailscale machine.
panels.title: Inbound Packets by Path

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the outbound bytes by path for the selected Tailscale machine.
panels.title: Outbound Bytes by Path

panels.description: A timeseries panel showing the outbound packets by path for the selected Tailscale machine.
panels.title: Outbound Packets by Path

title: Tailscale / Machine
